verses.roman:
choṭa-putre dekhi' prabhu nāma puchilā
'paramānanda-dāsa'-nāma sena jānāilā

synonyms: choṭa-putre—the youngest son; dekhi'-seeing; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; nāma puchilā—inquired about his name; paramānanda-dāsa—Paramānanda dāsa; nāma—name; sena—Śivānanda Sena; jānāilā—informed.
translation: Lord Caitanya asked the youngest son's name, and Śivānanda Sena informed the Lord that his name was Paramānanda dāsa.
